Siri Shortcuts ChatGPT

Made by @kavirkaycee

General

  1. Hey GPT
    1. Siri, Hey Google, Alexa type assistant by voice dictation https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/506253fe726442a88889d173cbfa37e2
  1. Hey GPT Text
    1. Siri, Hey Google, Alexa type assistant by text https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/da6ddd1489d7459ba382dfdd3b6da0d5

Productivity

  1. Organize Brain Dump
    1. Use your voice to organize your incoherent thoughts into coherent ones categorized under tasks and actions https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/49263c0480704815a475a553464d30cc
  1. Make To Do List Actionable
    1. Use your voice to make a task more actionable by breaking it down to sub tasks https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/371aee495ca84f73b7e43d020be8e580

Social

  1. TweetGPT
    1. Use your voice to make your incoherent thoughts into tweetable nuggets https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/eb1ac28e0f6b4caeb2d6bce62cb5185c

Writing

  1. Write Essay
    1. Dictate a concept and let ChatGPT write an essay with a thesis statement, supporting evidence, counter arguments, and finally summarizing the key ideas https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/3dbb424670e3499494450f99b5f27f24
